controller

Class FriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FriendController

  • public class FriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendController class coordinates the functions available in the Data Managers for the Menu class. It manages FriendDataManager and FarmerDataManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendController()
      Constructs a FarmerController object and Initialises Data Managers

      • sendRequest

        public void sendRequest(Farmer f,
               java.lang.String username)
                 throws FarmCityControlException,
                        java.io.IOException
        The process of user send friend request
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object of user
        username - The user name of the Farmer, user want to sent request to
        Throws:
        FarmCityControlException - Throw exception when user send request to oneself
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no friends.csv

      • unfriend

        public boolean unfriend(Farmer f,
               int num)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        The process of user wants to remove a friend
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object of user
        num - The choice corresponding to the friend, user wants to remove.
        Returns:
        result The boolean result if the friend is successfully removed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no friends.csv

      • acceptRequest

        public java.lang.String acceptRequest(Farmer f,
                             int num)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        The process of user accepts a friend request
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object of user
        num - The choice corresponding to the request, user wants to accept.
        Returns:
        result null if the selected farmer is already in friend list. an empty string if the selected farmer doesn't exist. the username of the new friend if accept successfully.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no friends.csv

      • rejectRequest

        public boolean rejectRequest(Farmer f,
                    int num)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        The process of user reject a friend request
        Parameters:
        f - The Farmer object of user
        num - The choice corresponding to the request, user wants to reject.
        Returns:
        result The boolean result if the friend is successfully removed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throw exception when there is no friends.csv
